div.pre: 1414 Konya (anc. Iconium) environs, Ly- caonia, 1946 Burial: c. 187 B.C. (M) Contents: c. 890 AV Alexander III: tetradr.; c. 500 dr. Lysimachus: tetradr. Eumenes I: tetradr. Eumenes II: tetradr. Antiochus I: tetradr. Antiochus II: tetradr. Antiochus III: tetradr. Antiochus VIII: tetradr. Disposition: dispersed The hd. was said to contain about 500 Alexander dr. and c. 390 tetradr. of the rulers listed above. The tetradr. of Antiochus VIII are presumably in- trusive
